# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #38](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#38)

#### Czanos

If a Feruchemist Taps warmth, does it actually warm them up physically, or do they just feel warmer?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It actually warms them. Itâ€™s not just a feeling.
